header.title: Draws
header.subtitle: Create and manage gift exchange draws

empty.title: No draws yet
empty.description: Create your first draw to get started with gift assignments

searchEmpty.title: No draws found
searchEmpty.description: No draws match your search. Try adjusting your filters.

accessDenied.message: You don't have permission to view draws for this group.

executeError.title: Unable to Execute Draw
executeError.noValidConfig: The current group configuration makes it impossible to assign everyone. This usually happens when: constraints eliminate too many valid pairs, you have too many exclusions, or not enough active members.
executeError.noValidConfigWithMinimum: You need at least {{minimum}} active members to execute this draw. Try adding more members to your group.
executeError.unknownError: This usually means there are too many exclusions or not enough members. Try:

finalize.title: Finalize Draw?
finalize.confirmMessage: Once finalized, this draw becomes immutable and cannot be modified.

notify.title: Send Notifications
notify.confirmMessage: Members will receive email notifications with their assignments.
notify.resendCheckbox: Resend to all members (notifications were previously sent)

results.subtitle: {{groupName}} - Draw #{{drawId}}
results.previewMode: Preview Mode: These results are not yet finalized. You can review them before committing to finalize the draw.

assignments.title: Assignments:
assignments.searchPlaceholder: Search by giver or receiver name...
